amendment.description: Amendment increases the operational support given to organizations for full-time individuals enrolled in an approved national service position by changing the support from $600 to $800 and from $800 to $1000 if a program supports at least 50 percent disadvantaged youth.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-39 to increase the operational support given to organizations for full-time individuals enrolled in an approved national service position. The amendment proposes increasing the support from $600 to $800 and from $800 to $1000 if program supports at least 50 percent disadvantaged youth.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey (CO) amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 283 - 147 (Roll no. 137).
